statements: UPDATE VehicleInsuranceDetails SET insurance_provider = 'AllState', policy_start_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
UPDATE VehicleInsuranceDetails SET policy_end_date = '2023-12-31', vehicle_make = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 5678;
UPDATE VehicleInsuranceDetails SET insurance_provider='Insurance Corp', policy_number='123456', policy_start_date='2023-01-01', policy_end_date='2024-01-01' WHERE vehicle_id=1;

UPDATE VehicleInsuranceDetails SET policy_number='987654', vehicle_make='Toyota', vehicle_model='Corolla', insurance_provider='PolicyGenius', policy_start_date='2022-06-15', policy_end_date='2023-06-15' WHERE vehicle_id=5;
UPDATE vehicle_insurance SET insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance', insurance_policy_number = '12345' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE claim_history SET claim_description = 'Minor accident on the highway', claim_amount = 5000.00, claim_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE claim_id = 101;
UPDATE vehicle_insurance SET insurance_company = 'ACME Insurance', insurance_policy_number = '12345' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE claim_history SET claim_description = 'Minor accident occurred on the highway', claim_amount = 5000.00, claim_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE claim_id = 2;
UPDATE VehicleInfo SET registration_date = '2021-09-30' WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE InsuranceDetails SET premium_amount = 1500.75, start_date = '2021-10-01' WHERE policy_number = 2001;
UPDATE VehicleInfo SET vehicle_make = 'Toyota', registration_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE InsuranceDetails SET insurer_name = 'ABC Insurance', premium_amount = 5000.00 WHERE policy_number = 201;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET expiration_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
UPDATE policy_details SET policy_type = 'Comprehensive' WHERE policy_number = 67890;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance', expiration_date = '2023-05-20' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE policy_details SET policy_type = 'Comprehensive', policy_end_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE policy_number = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicles SET vehicle_model_year = 2023, vehicle_name = 'New Model' WHERE vehicle_id = 5;

UPDATE vehicles SET vehicle_type='SUV' WHERE vehicle_id=2;
